name: Alas, Poor Yeetrick (Full)
description:
Control your character using D, F, J, and K.

(To control the menu, hold in the corresponding key for 3 seconds)

A physics-based non-standard-movement platformer inspired by Bennet Foddy's 'Getting Over It'

Yeetrick and his four Holy Machetes must reach the Holy Grain. Yeet thineself forth upon the machetes, Yeetrick!

Created for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam with the theme "Only One".  Like Getting Over It, this game has only one mechanic for the player, only one life (no death) and only one level.

(Best played in a resolution of 1920 x 1080, but if you can't do that, just center the screen on your character)

Dev Note: This version is an newer version than the one uploaded for the game jam itself.

As far as the game jam is concerned, you can rate based on the older version since it is the one actually uploaded - the differences should be small enough to not affect your opinion in any case. It is available at https://pure-awesome.itch.io/alas-poor-yeetrick

However, this is the "true" version of the game as far as we're concerned, (and was created entirely within the game jam time).
